text:
I have found their storage system to be exceptionally structured and well-organized, greatly reducing the risk of human error when locating and delivering goods. The system they offer has revolutionized our order processing and made inventory tracking incredibly efficient—unlike anything I have experienced before.

Their customer support team is outstanding—always professional, responsive, and willing to go the extra mile.

We have been thoroughly impressed with their services, which is why we have maintained a strong and long-standing partnership with iHub.

What truly sets them apart is the leadership of Mr. Koh, the founder. He is an inspiring figure, committed to finding innovative solutions that meet the needs of his customers. His dedication to excellence and customer satisfaction is truly remarkable

Service was good and the team are responsive.
Been engage with their service for decade and so far never experience any unpleasant journey. Great work and high performance team leading by the founder Mr Koh.

I love their services because they have a unique system that helps with my inventory management to real time tracking of my products. Not only that, they have a very reliable customer service team that are always supportive and helpful whenever I reach out to them. I also find that their drivers are very patient and friendly. Most importantly, they are able to provide me solutions like giving me a faster order processing system. All in all, I am very satisfied with their efficient service! Thank you IHub, keep up the good work!
A true solutions based warehouse and delivery company.  Through strong leadership and a great team they focus on creatively/efficiently solving customer needs.

I only heard of iHub Logistics wherein I received my delivery which I ordered online. The service is on time, the staff were competent and professional. I did inquired about my delivery as I received an advisory via SMS and the moment they answered the phone I felt secured that my items were in good hands. The item itself upon received were in good condition, proper documentation attached and the guy was very friendly. Overall, doing business with iHub was a smooth transaction and rest assured that your items be it small or fragile it is very well taken cared of. Kudos to the all the staff who look after my items. Thank you.
